description.lang: The PE653 is intended to be a low cost Pool and Spa controller, used to monitor water temperature, cleaning, and chemical circulation for consumer level pools and spas.Fully submersible and shock resistantZ-Wave certified - use with any Z-Wave devices, even those from another manufacturerBacklit LCD display makes for easier programming, day or nightIncludes 3 AA batteries and self-stick labels for naming the function buttons

deviceDescription.productName: MultiWave PE653 Five-Channel Wireless Remote Receiver
